title: Best Nothing CMF Phone 1 screen protectors
description: Keep your Nothing CMF Phone 1 screen protected with these best screen protectors. The post Best Nothing CMF Phone 1 screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your Nothing CMF Phone 1 screen protected with these best screen protectors.
text: The Nothing CMF Phone 1 is an Android smartphone aimed at budget buyers. It sports a 6.67-inch Full HD+ (1080 x 2400 pixels) AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It offers Always On Display, 2,000 nits peak brightness, and a punch-hole at the top. It is a good display at this budget, but like all other displays, you need to ensure it doesn’t get damaged. This is why you need a screen protector that can prevent scratches, smudges, and other damage. Check out these best Nothing CMF Phone 1 screen protectors. Mr. Shield Screen Protectors (3-pack) This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a 9H hardness rated screen protector. It has 2.5D rounded-edge glass along with anti-bubble and rainbow-effect proofing. It is said to maintain touch response and clarity even post-application. There is a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating for reducing sweat and reduce fingerprints. Ibywind Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector (2+1 pack) It is 9H rated for tempered glass hardness and offers complete coverage. You get 2.5D rounded edges and no difference in the touch response. There is an alignment frame to help with hassle-free installation. The package has two pieces of screen protectors and a camera lens protector. Beukei Screen Protector (3-pack) This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat. Kwmobile Screen Protector It is another budget screen protector option. It offers easy installation that prevents air bubbles. It is scratch-resistant and has an oleophobic coating to keep smudges away. Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. html:
The Nothing CMF Phone 1 is an Android smartphone aimed at budget buyers. It sports a 6.67-inch Full HD+ (1080 x 2400 pixels) AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It offers Always On Display, 2,000 nits peak brightness, and a punch-hole at the top.

It is a good display at this budget, but like all other displays, you need to ensure it doesn’t get damaged. This is why you need a screen protector that can prevent scratches, smudges, and other damage. Check out these best Nothing CMF Phone 1 screen protectors.

Mr. Shield Screen Protectors (3-pack)

This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating.

Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a 9H hardness rated screen protector. It has 2.5D rounded-edge glass along with anti-bubble and rainbow-effect proofing. It is said to maintain touch response and clarity even post-application. There is a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating for reducing sweat and reduce fingerprints.

Ibywind Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector (2+1 pack)

It is 9H rated for tempered glass hardness and offers complete coverage. You get 2.5D rounded edges and no difference in the touch response. There is an alignment frame to help with hassle-free installation. The package has two pieces of screen protectors and a camera lens protector.

Beukei Screen Protector (3-pack)

This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat.

Kwmobile Screen Protector

It is another budget screen protector option. It offers easy installation that prevents air bubbles. It is scratch-resistant and has an oleophobic coating to keep smudges away.

Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

Ajit is a freelance tech reporter who loves everything tech but has a soft corner for Android. He started his stint in tech journalism in 2015 and has previously worked with publications like Digit India and Android Headlines. You can also find his work on MySmartPrice.
